turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a Starbucks drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did u want to order from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that was a grande americano with 2% milk from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total will be $3.00. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 513 South Florida Avenue, Tampa, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. i've placed your order at 513 south florida avenue in tampa florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it'll be ready in 10 minutes. do you need anything else?
